OrgName.entry: RECYCLING BRING BANK SITE - POSTAL DISTRICT 14

Desc.entry: Blackstock Road Recycling Site, Blackstock Road - paper, glass, textiles, plastics, steel cans, aluminium cans, furniture, motor oil, mobile phones, domestic paint, green waste, books, card, rubble, shoes, car batteries, scrap metal, electrical and electronic equipment, wood, household batteries, fluorescent tubes, mixed lamps. Callow Place, Callow Road - paper, glass, textiles, plastics, steel cans, aluminium cans. Sheffield Homes, Leighton Road Car Park - glass.
